mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMUNITY_SEQ, C.TITLE, C.COMMUNITY_YN, C.READ_CNT, C.USER_ID, U.USER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(C.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM COMMUNITY C, USER_INFO U WHERE C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY C.COMMUNITY_YN, C.REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_SEQ, TITLE, COMMUNITY_YN, CONTENTS, USER_ID, READ_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.COMMUNITY_SEQ),0)+1 FROM COMMUNITY A), #{title}, #{communityYn}, #{contents}, (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}), 0, #{userId}, SYSDATE(), #{userId}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMUNITY_SEQ, C.TITLE, C.COMMUNITY_YN, C.READ_CNT, C.USER_ID, C.CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(C.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT FROM COMMUNITY C WHERE C.COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET TITLE = #{title}, COMMUNITY_YN = #{communityYn}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_ID = #{userId}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq} WHERE USER_INFO = #{userId}
